author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Houston American Energy Corp. Announces First Quarter 2018 Results Updates Reeves County Production
text:
Houston American Energy Corp:
* HOUSTON AMERICAN ENERGY CORP. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; UPDATES REEVES COUNTY PRODUCTION
* HOUSTON AMERICAN ENERGY CORP - QTRLY PRODUCTION VOLUMES TOTALED 7,978 BARRELS OF OIL AND 63,409 THOUSAND CUBIC FEET OF GAS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
